title: Are the Bilgewater Skins Here to Stay?
body: I am curious if the Bilgewater event skins will still be available even after the event ends on the 10th.  Can anyone confirm whether or not they are going to be available after?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

They're not legacy, so they'll be available in the shop, even after the Burning Tides event.

May i ask when the summoner icons event ends?

I got the two first and i need some time to finish the third
The Burning Tides event ends August 10th!
thanks, seems i got enough time!
Will this include the Bilgewater wards/crest icon?
Awesome!  Thank you for the quick response.
